# Larry Sanders

[Council Members](https://www.rathdrum.gov/pview.aspx?id=394&catid=951)

[John Hatcher](https://www.rathdrum.gov/pview.aspx?id=172&catid=951)

[Larry Sanders](https://www.rathdrum.gov/pview.aspx?id=110&catid=951)

[John Hodgkins](https://www.rathdrum.gov/pview.aspx?id=182&catid=951)

[Ken Owens](https://www.rathdrum.gov/pview.aspx?id=107&catid=951)

[Council Responsibilities](https://www.rathdrum.gov/pview.aspx?id=493&catid=951)

 

![Larry Sanders](https://rathdrumid.municipalone.com/files/images/image1417010446011124pm.jpg)

I am an Idaho native, born in Nampa in 1956. After Graduating from Nampa High School in 1974, I realized a change in life was due. In 1979 I moved to North Idaho and immediately fell in love with the area. Then in 1983 I fell in love with my wife Laura. We have attended Rathdrum Bible Church since the early 80's, where I accepted Christ as my Lord and Savior. 

I knew hundreds of people in Post Falls, but watched it bust at the seams. The small town feel was rapidly disappearing. I was saddened to see that happen, but understood due to the proximity of Post Falls that it was inevitable. We felt the need to move here, and after relocating to Rathdrum I once again had that small town atmosphere and began to feel at home. But living here for 17 years, I'm beginning to see that disappear. I believe that we live in one of the nicest towns in Idaho. I hear people say let's make Rathdrum great again! Rathdrum is already a great place to live and my goal is to keep it that way. With the help of our new Mayor and my fellow council members whom I have great confidence in, we can make Rathdrum a better place to live. I am humbled and honored to serve my community and the citizens of Rathdrum, and look forward to doing so for the next 4 years. Being a good listener is a characteristic that I work hard at. So feel free to reach out to me anytime. Remember it is not a reality to please everyone, so I will strive to do whats best for our community and always seek to do whats prudent. Please reach out to me anytime. May God bless our community and it's citizens.

Email me at [lsanders@rathdrum.gov](mailto:lsanders@rathdrum.gov)

 

 

 

![](https://www.rathdrum.gov/common/images/footerlogo.png)
